name: Serious Sam: The Second Encounter

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Demo/Bin/SeriousSam.exe
game.working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Demo

write_file.file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Demo/Scripts/PersistentSymbols.ini

content:
files:
- demo: https://archive.org/download/serioussamsedemo/SeriousSamSEDemo.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Demo/Bin/SeriousSam.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter
    Demo
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: demo
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
- write_file:
    content: persistent extern user INDEX gap_iDepthBits=(INDEX)24;
    description: fix depth bug https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=11970#c49
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Croteam/Serious Sam - The Second Encounter
      Demo/Scripts/PersistentSymbols.ini
